issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Remove Dataset::partition_expression
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12892](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12892). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We don't have compelling use cases for this and now that subtree pruning has been restored in ARROW-8658 it offers no performance advantage over attaching the common expression to each of the Dataset's Fragments.
